snippet: Two goals from Raheem Sterling helped Liverpool avoid a slip-up and earn a 3-1 win at second-tier Bournemouth in the League Cup quarterfinals. Tottenham also advanced to the semifinals, easing past Newcastle with a 4-0 victory.
abstract: Liverpool earns 3-1 win at second-tier Bournemouth in League Cup quarterfinals; Tottenham also advances to semifinals, easing past Newcastle with a 4-0 victory; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Two goals from Raheem Sterling helped Liverpool avoid a slip-up and earn a 3-1 win at second-tier Bournemouth in the League Cup quarterfinals. Tottenham also advanced to the semifinals, easing past Newcastle with a 4-0 victory.

headline.main: Liverpool and Tottenham Advance in League Cup
headline.print_headline: Liverpool and Tottenham Advance in League Cup
